${modID}:brokenSyringe.NAME: Broken Syringe
${modID}:brokenSyringe.FLAVOR: The plunger is jammed. You might need to hit it with something.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you lose HP during combat, heal 8 HP.

${modID}:conquerorWorm.NAME: Conqueror Worm
DESCRIPTIONS: All enemies have less health, but have a small chance to give you a parasite.

${modID}:ashTray.NAME: Ash Tray
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 3rd card that exhausts when played is refunded its energy cost.

${modID}:cloverKey.NAME: Clover Key
DESCRIPTIONS: The next chest you open will contain an extra uncommon or rare relic.

${modID}:spigot.NAME: Spigot
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have 2 or more debuffs at the start of your turn, draw 1 extra card.

${modID}:incenseBundle.NAME: Incense Bundle
${modID}:incenseBundle.FLAVOR: Supposedly the vapors can purify anything, albeit very slowly. - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: Exhausting a card removes 1 stack of a random debuff from yourself.

${modID}:scalpel.NAME: Scalpel
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, choose 1 card to remove from your deck.
